author: HappyTowersGuest
title: Consistently Perfect
text:
Every visit is characterized by consistently superior service.
Anna-Marie (who has a tireless work ethic), Melody and Susan in Towers Reception are so good, I would swear they have telepathy.
Roxanne in Reservations is patient, cheerful and accommodating.
Veronica and Omar in Pommes Palais have my morning tea waiting before I even place my order.
Ms. Sharma and her Housekeeping staff remember every detail of my preferences and provide expedient, unobtrusive responses to any request.
Kudos to Gavin Hasty who supervises this confident, thoughtful and capable staff. He always makes me feel so at home, I actually call the hotel "home" when I am in NYC for work.
The property is immaculate and perfect, however the staff is the perfect face of this hotel and without a doubt its best feature.
Thanks again for the sanctuary.
